name: Cannabis
description:
DELAYED: Work on this title is temporarily suspended. I was using the associated Cannabis category on Twitch to locate possible contributors to this project. The intent was always to highlight the streamers not parody them. Hopefully everything will be worked out soon with Twitch and their cannabis streamers so that work can resume.

Cannabis is a visual novel for adults.

The story is about cannabis streamers who stream cannabis. The characters are friends even though they may disagree at times over how, when or where to stream cannabis. If they take the time to talk to each other, they could probably resolve their differences and remain friends.

There are no choices and only one ending.
